text: the American people have a common saying
follow the money if you do this with all
our politicians you will see who they
really serve they are not the
representatives of the American people
they are the representatives of big
business of the military industrial
complex of big Pharma of big Banks and
investment firms in other words the
representatives of the American people
are actually the representatives of the
exploiters of the American people those
who keep us poor indebted and desperate
but the American people already know
this they don't need me to tell them
only 19% think that their politicians
actually represent them and an even
lower 11% sees the media that is the
main ideological institutions of the
ruling class as trustworthy what we have
in our hands therefore is what is called
a crisis of legitimacy the consent that
the ruling order needs from the people
is not being received Americans are
seeing their tax dollars wasted used to
fund a genocidal state founded on ethnic
cleansing while everything literally
crumbles back home at the ranch that is
why even if there is a ceasefire now
nothing will go back to normal hundreds
of millions of people have seen the true
monstrous faces of the so-called Western
democracies this is a reality we cannot
unsee the mask is off for good our
countries are ran by criminals who will
slaughter a whole people for profit and
squash the Democratic rights of their
citizens if they dare to challenge the
funding of a genocide with their tax
dollars history teaches us that when
such conditions exist of such extreme
tension between the governing and the
governed the owners and the producers
things cannot continue for very long in
the same something at some point has got
to give the people erupt and a new
Society develops I say that we should
work so that that new society that
develop is not something much more
barbaric but a society that's actually
of by and for the people in substance
not just in name as what we've had for a
very long time in this country
